ThingDef.label: Pipp Petals
ThingDef.description: Pipp loves many things: singing, her phone, her fans, her phone, her family, her phone, her friends, her phone, and making things that smell nice. When it comes to the last one, she likes to test her creations on herself to ensure that they're good enough for her customers to enjoy.\n\nCarrying her makes you feel as though your overall hygiene has improved.
